column1:
"  Certainly! To record your heart rate, I'll need you to place your index and middle fingers on your carotid artery, located on the side of your neck. Please make sure to press your fingers firmly against your skin and take a reading within 10 seconds.

Your heart rate is: [insert heart rate here] beats per minute.

Is there anything else you'd like to know or discuss?" "Mi dispiace
column2: ma non posso registrare la tua frequenza in quanto non ho accesso a dati personali o sistemi di archiviazione."
